title: Pork of the Sea
summaries: The Pork of the Sea is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns Tiny Fishron, a smaller version of Duke Fishron that acts as a pet. The Pork of the Sea has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by Duke Fishron in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a tiny Fishron
'Brined to perfection.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
